00015 namespace litesql {
00016 using namespace std;
00017 class Database;
00021 template <class T>
00022 class Cursor {
00023 private:
00025     const Database& db;
00027     Backend::Cursor * cursor;
00029     bool done;
00031     bool dataReady;
00033     Record currentRow;
00034 public:
00035     Cursor(const Database& db, Backend::Cursor * c);
00037     ~Cursor();
00039     Cursor<T> & operator++();
00041     Cursor<T> & operator++(int) { return operator++();}
00043     vector<T> dump();
00045     T operator*();
00047     inline bool rowsLeft() { return !done; }
00048 };
00049 
00050 template <class T>
00051 Cursor<T>::Cursor(const Database& db_, Backend::Cursor * c)
00052     : db(db_), cursor(c), done(false), dataReady(false) {
00053     operator++();
00054 }
00055 template <class T>
00056 Cursor<T>::~Cursor() {
00057     delete cursor;
00058 }
00059 template <class T>
00060 Cursor<T> & Cursor<T>::operator++() {
00061     if (done)
00062         return *this;
00063     currentRow = cursor->fetchOne();
00064     if (currentRow.size() == 0) {
00065         done = true;
00066         dataReady = false;
00067     }
00068     else
00069         dataReady = true;
00070         
00071     return *this;
00072 }
00073 
00074 template <class T>
00075 vector<T> Cursor<T>::dump() {
00076     vector<T> res;
00077     for (;!done;operator++())
00078         res.push_back(operator*());
00079     return res;
00080 }
00081 template <class T>
00082 T Cursor<T>::operator*() {
00083     Record rec;
00084 
00085     if (!dataReady)
00086         throw NotFound();
00087 
00088     return T(db,currentRow);
00089 }
00090 
00091 }
